title: 'Desi' touch: Indian scientists help create largest map of the universe
selftext: The Indian team led by Dr. Shadab Alam from TIFR is hopeful that as Desi continues its observations over a planned five-year timeline, it is expected to amass maps of 40 million galaxies.
comments: Headlines designed for whatsapp uncle audience.
Is the map 3d ? Cuz shape of the universe is as complex as a kliener bottleel
